title: Cat gets her own back on unsuspecting feline by knocking her into pool
text:
Owner said on closer inspection, it was 'plotted revenge' for an earlier attack

A cat who was biding her time to get revenge on another cat was caught on CCTV pushing the tabby into a swimming pool.

Hilarious footage shows the black cat sneaking up on her unsuspecting mate, who is sitting by the edge of the pool and gazing into the distance.

The cat leaps up to knock her into the water before making a quick getaway as the soaked victim promptly exits the pool to chase her.

My cat came inside soaking wet, so I did some investigating and found this. pic.twitter.com/s1ygmFQArp — Laura Lee (@Laura88Lee) October 3, 2019

We did a further investigation, it was plotted revenge. pic.twitter.com/9lduGij4NI — Laura Lee (@Laura88Lee) October 3, 2019

A cat who was biding her time to get revenge on another cat was caught on CCTV pushing the tabby into a swimming pool

Hilarious footage shows the black cat sneaking up on her unsuspecting mate, who is sitting by the edge of the pool and gazing into the distance

The cat leaps up to knock her into the water before making a quick getaway as the soaked victim promptly exits the pool to chase her

The cats' owner, Laura Lee, said that she was confused when one of her cats came into her home dripping wet. Most cats will go out of their way to avoid water.

'My cat came inside soaking wet, so I did some investigating and found this,' Laura wrote on Twitter, along with the incriminating CCTV footage.

'We did a further investigation, it was plotted revenge,' she said, along with another video of the cats fighting

She added that after some more investigating, she realized that the pool-pushing incident had been 'plotted revenge' by her black cat.

'We did a further investigation, it was plotted revenge,' she said, along with another video of the cats fighting.

Both cats appear to be playing on what looks like a puzzle board, when the tabby cat sneakily reaches out to bite the black cat on her back leg, causing her to make a swift exit.

Laura wrote alongside the video: 'She's so feisty.'
description: Incriminating CCTV shows a black cat choosing the perfect moment to push her unsuspecting tabby friend into a swimming pool in a 'revenge plot' for an earlier attack.
